title: Script to go with Nuetra Face
content: I'm working on a logo and am considering using a script with Nuetra Face. "The Barge Lady" would be set in Nuetra Face and following that would be "Collections" set in a complimentary script. Any suggestions would be appreciated.
author: jonny

comments.content: Excellent, I was considering Freehand 521 but I believe I like your suggestion more. Thank you kindly Hhrant.

Wow, I think Coquette is much better.   
And you've reminded me of Linoscript, although that would be a pretty extreme match-up.   
   
hhp

Nice pick, Hrant. [Coquette](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016223415/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/marksimonson/coquette/) is also an interesting choice as   
the forms and x-height nearly match Neutraface. You might   
want something that contrasts, though.
